title: Experimensen
overview: A weekly changing panel of two panel members - including Maxim Hartman, Katja Schuurman, Bridget Maasland, Irene Moors and Britt Dekker - goes in search of the answers. They crack their brains and come up with the most logical explanation.Panelshow in which science and humor meet. Comedian Stefano Keizers brings scientific news every week. He discusses facts, studies and research.
